Description: As a Meeting Organizer I want to upload meeting recordings in MP3 WAV or MP4 format So that the system can process my recorded meetings
Acceptance Criteria: System accepts files up to 500MB in MP3 WAV MP4 formats; File validation occurs within 5 seconds; Invalid formats show clear error messages; Upload progress indicator displays for files greater than 50MB

Description: As a Meeting Organizer I want to capture live audio from Google Meet/Zoom/Teams So that I dont need to manually record and upload meetings
Acceptance Criteria: OAuth integration with Google Meet Zoom Microsoft Teams; Real-time audio streaming starts within 10 seconds of meeting start; Audio quality check runs automatically; System handles network interruptions gracefully

Description: As a Meeting Organizer I want to input meeting details So that the system has context for better transcription and analysis
Acceptance Criteria: Form accepts title organizer email participant list scheduled time agenda; Calendar integration auto-fills metadata when available; Metadata validation ensures required fields are present; Metadata saved before transcription begins

Description: As a Reviewer I want transcription with WER less than or equal to 5 percent on clear audio So that meeting minutes are accurate and reliable
Acceptance Criteria: Whisper large-v3 model integrated; WER less than or equal to 5 percent validated on test dataset; Transcription completes within 10 minutes for 60-minute meeting; Timestamps accurate to within 1 second

Description: As a Meeting Participant I want speakers automatically identified in transcripts So that I can see who said what during the meeting
Acceptance Criteria: PyAnnote diarization detects up to 8 unique speakers; Speaker turns labeled with 90 percent plus accuracy; Speaker IDs consistent throughout transcript; Custom speaker names can be assigned post-transcription

Description: As a QA Team Member I want poor audio quality segments automatically flagged So that I can review potentially inaccurate transcriptions
Acceptance Criteria: Audio quality assessment runs on upload; Segments with SNR less than 10dB flagged in UI; Visual indicators show flagged sections in transcript; Manual review workflow triggered for flagged segments

Description: As an Organizer I want to assign real names to Speaker 1 Speaker 2 etc So that meeting minutes use actual participant names
Acceptance Criteria: UI allows editing speaker labels during/after transcription; Labels persist across entire transcript; Labels reflect in exported minutes; Bulk label assignment for recurring meetings
